list.description:
Ass sight

This is universal

If you guys want to change the color of the sight

Find the crosshair color section, and change the numbers to the desired color

here's a tutorial for this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1B7J8rNcxoU

ZIP file contains ordinary sight (OrdinaryCircle) and the sight with the cavemochi (circle).

Sight size also varies by sight magnification of tanks

Munetani Mashiro High School Fleet universal sight

Requested by @typicalpilot2311

lots of sizes. plz take a look at images I uploaded to find proper size.
colored ver & skp file included

unzip and move .blk files to War Thunder\UserSights\all_tanks

#anime #universal_sight #universal #sight #high_school_fleet #haifuri #munetani_mashiro #munetani #mashiro

I just made some changes with the fov-circle diameter for some tanks

SassySvczka's Tournament sights, pack for 18 vehicles.

Included vehicles are on the second picture in the post, on the first picture you have exactly described example of Tiger H1 how to use those sights

How to put them in the game?
Download the zip file, unzip it and out of the zip folder will come out folder with 21 files, in those files will be text file with instruction how to make everything step by step.

To use the sight properly I'm recommending to go into the game Controls - Ground vehicles - Weaponry and set the option ...

#t72b3m #t72_b3 #t72b3 #t_72_b3 #t72 #t80bvm #t_80bvm #t80

Прицел для Российских ОБТ (т72б3 и т80бвм) - PSO_5

Как установить: Заходим в папку игры и распаковываем архив в папке UserSights - если ее нет нужно создать.

P.s. Использование прицела подразумевает использование СУО - на танке без него будет несколько сложнее.

#t80u #t_80u #t80_u

Прицел на Т-80У

Давно я должен был выпустить этот прицел, но до недавнего времени у меня не было 80тки в ангаре.
Назван как PSO_4 из-за внешнего сходства.

Как установить: Заходим в папку игры и распаковываем архив в папке UserSights - если ее нет нужно создать.

P.s. Использование прицела подразумевает использование СУО - на танке без него будет несколько сложнее.

[MOD CANCELED]
(Israel) Historical and semi-historical gun reticles.
...

#bmp_2 #bmp_2m #bmp_2md #bmp2 #bmp2m

Прицельная сетка для БМП-2М с боевым модулем "Бережок"

Из особенностей:

  • Зоны пуска ПТУРов до 10м - это нужно для стрельбы птурами при выезде из-за угла
  • Основа прицела - мои же прицелы для советских/российских ОБТ

( у меня лично не раз бывало такое, что при выезде из- за угла и пуске птура, птур улетал в стену.... Что поделать, паралакс... Надеюсь теперь буду меньше стрелять в стену)

An update to FOX_365's T72M2 Sight that allows the 30mm range markers to move when you use the range zeroing, so you can still aim it correctly.

Also added a few more main gun notches, as the original stopped at 2800.

All credit here to FOX-365, check out his stuff here - https://live.warthunder.com/user/FoX_365/

#t72m2 #moderna #t72m2moderna #t72m

FIRE CONTROL SYSTEM "TOCHKA-SM2"

Project development is being continued by a different person. To get most actual version go to:

https://discord.gg/umdGKBweRs
OR
https://github.com/tsvl/WT-FCSGenerator

Last update 17.10.2025
- Added the tanks of the latest updates.

Working fire control system that allows you to determine the distance to the enemy tank by changing the angle of elevation of the barrel.
...

I made a sight inspired by the decal of the YouTuber Dita https://www.youtube.com/c/dita2233
installation: unzip, move the folder "UserSights" to the root folder of the game
#Dita

#type90 #type90b #type_90 #type_90b

NOT MY ORIGINAL CREATION


The original sight was made by @Nirrti but due to updates the "sim" markings that show range when using gunner sight were no longer accurate. I let them know, and checked before uploading this and they never fixed it.

I haven't changed the location of the marks i just changed the range number. I don't know how to move the marks to make them more useful ranges but at least its accurate now.

If they fix the markings on their original upload ill take this down.

This is my favorite user sight and wish i could have...

#universal

I don't know why I made this but I hope you like it.
This sight was made for a gun with over 800m/s so if your lines don't fit into the rhombus you can change it.

Неподвижные прицелы в СБ для большинства самолётов с гиропицелом без неподвижной части
Static Gunsights for SB, only for ~half crafts which have only gyro.

СССР: Ла-200, Ла-15, Як-23, Миг-15\Бис\немецкий, Миг-17,Миг-19, Миг-21Ф-13, Су-7 Б\БКЛ\БМК (у сушек оба прицела ибо там гиро нужен). Для Миг-15 бесишь  скиньте название папки и .blk файла - сделаю

Китай: J-7-II, J-2, J-4, J-6, Shenang F-5, A-5c, Q-5\5A

США: F-104a, F-104c (Фантомы, F-5e, F-105, AV-8, A-7 -  нет)

Шведы: J32B, J35D, J35A должен работать тоже по идее

Брит: Lightning F.6 (Фантомы, Ягуары, Харьки - нет)

...

Only for the German Turm III.

Im new at this custom sights modding but i made this for the 30mm sights.
i might update another one with more complex design (perhaps, don't count on it)

#anime #shigure #kancolle
English-
I suddenly wanted to make it with shigure, so I invested a few weeks to make it.

한국어-
시구레 가지고 만들어 보고 싶다는 갑자기 들어서 몇 주 투자해서 만들었습니다.

Pack of sights for all tanks for simulator, realistic and arcade battles.

This pack of sights has been fully generated automatically. You can customize the design of sights by changing the settings, which are then applied by the script.
Read more here https://live.warthunder.com/post/1068145/

Updated 18.12
- New vehicles up to War Thunder 2.53
- Sight fixes
- Added missing M1KVT and M4/T26.

Contacts
For all questions Discord https://discord.gg/qjvECBPUxq

Installation:
1) Unzip UserSights.zip into folder:
for Windows: Documents\My Gam...
